caption: This photograph depicts a serene rural scene at sunset. The sky, filled with shades of orange and red, serves as the vibrant background. Sunlight diffuses across the horizon, casting a warm glow. In silhouette against this vivid sky, a classic windmill stands prominently on the right. It is an old-fashioned, metal structure typical of rural landscapes. To the left of the windmill, there is a dark, silhouette outline of a simple, rectangular barn-like building, featuring sharp angles and a sloping roof. Additional tree silhouettes flank the structures, contributing to the rustic setting. The composition evokes a peaceful and serene end to the day in a rural setting, emphasizing the beauty of the natural environment and traditional technology used in agriculture.
title: Seward County farm and windmill at sunset
